ConnectionError.title: Connection Error
ConnectionError.commonsolution:
-Check your internet connection and try again
-Called endpoint is not available
-Check the endpoint URL

TimeoutError.title: Timeout Error
TimeoutError.commonsolution:
-Check your internet connection and try again
-Called endpoint is not available
-Check the endpoint URL
-Check server response code

urllib3.MaxRetryError.commonsolution:
-Check your internet connection and try again
-Called endpoint is not available
